mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM ( no, name, max, price, host_no, reg ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROOM_NO.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{max}, #{price}, #{host_no}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME='SEQ_ROOM_NO'

SELECT ss.room_no no, ss.name, ss.max, ss.price, ss.host_no hostno, ss.filename FROM ( SELECT min(i.no) no FROM image i INNER JOIN room r ON i.room_no = r.no WHERE r.host_no=#{no} GROUP BY i.room_no ) s, ( SELECT i.no no, i.ROOM_NO room_no, i.FILENAME filename, r.max max, r.name name, r.price price, r.host_no host_no FROM image i INNER JOIN room r ON i.room_no = r.no WHERE r.host_no =#{no} ) ss WHERE s.no = ss.no ORDER BY ss.room_no DESC
SELECT * FROM image i INNER JOIN room r ON i.room_no = r.no WHERE r.host_no=#{no} ORDER BY i.no DESC
SELECT * FROM image i INNER JOIN room r ON i.room_no = r.no WHERE r.host_no=#{no} and i.room_no = #{room_no} ORDER BY i.no DESC
